_header: Love is natural to every wight
_description: One mistress is best — three 5-line stanzas (ababc) with 4-line burden: ‘Smale pathis to the grenewode / Will I loue & shall I loue / Will I loue & shall I loue / No mo maydyns but one’

BLAdd5465.First Lines:
Loue is naturall to euery wyghtIndyfferent to euery
                    creature…
BLAdd5465.Last Lines:
…Foreuer yff she will trew beAnd loue her only whereeuer she
                    gone
BLAdd5465.Editions:
